rpgonline

Class MusicManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • rpgonline.MusicManager

  • public class MusicManager
extends java.lang.Object

    A class for loading, managing and switching between game music.

    Additionally, this class also provides utilities for loading and playing sound effects.

    If a call using an invalid ID or referencing an unmapped Music or Sound object is made then the call does not play any sound. For music this stops the music and for sound this does nothing.

    Any call to load music or sounds that use an already mapped ID will replace that mapped ID. Overall, this class acts as two maps of Sound and Music objects.

    Sounds mapped using loadSound() are not accessible from setMusic() and music mapped using loadMusic() is not accesible from play()

    Author:
    Tomas

    • Method Detail

      • setMusic

        public static void setMusic(java.lang.String id,
                            boolean loud)
        Sets the currently playing Music object. This will stop any previously playing music.
        Parameters:
        id - A previously ID.
        loud - A boolean value that determines the volume of the music. true -> 0.9 and false -> 0.4

      • playSound

        Plays a sound effect from an ID.
        Parameters:

                        float pitch,
                        float volume)
        Plays a sound effect from an ID with volume and pitch control.
        Parameters:
        id - A previously ID.
        pitch - The pitch to play the sound effect at.
        volume - The volume to play the sound effect at.

        Parameters:

        y - The y position of the sound effect.
        z - The z position of the sound effect.

        y - The y position of the sound effect.
        z - The z position of the sound effect.
        pitch - The pitch to play the sound effect at.
        volume - The volume to play the sound effect at.

      • loop

        public static void loop(java.lang.String id)
        Plays a sound effect from an ID. When the effect ends the effect plays again. This will repeat until stop() is called.
        Parameters:
        id - A previously ID.

      • loop

        public static void loop(java.lang.String id,
                        float pitch,
                        float volume)
        Plays a sound effect from an ID with volume and pitch control. When the effect ends the effect plays again. This will repeat until stop() is called.
        Parameters:
        id - A previously mapped ID.
        pitch - The pitch to play the sound effect at.
        volume - The volume to play the sound effect at.

      • playing

        public static boolean playing(java.lang.String id)
        Checks if a sound effect is playing.
        Parameters:
        id - A previously mapped ID.
        Returns:
        true if the sound is playing, false otherwise.

      • stop

        public static void stop(java.lang.String id)
        Stops a sound effect.
        Parameters:
        id - A previously mapped ID.

      • loadSound

        public static void loadSound(java.lang.String id,
                             java.net.URL loc)
                      throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException

        Loads a sound from the URL and maps it to the specified ID.

        This method only supports .ogg files. Use loadWav() to load a .wav file. Additionally, to be able to use positional sound the audio must have only one audio channel.

        Parameters:
        id - An unmapped ID.
        loc - A url pointing to a .ogg file.
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException - If an error occurred loading sound.

      • loadWav

        public static void loadWav(java.lang.String id,
                           java.net.URL loc)
                    throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException

        Loads a sound from the URL and maps it to the specified ID.

        This method only supports .wav files. Use loadSound() to load a .ogg file. Additionally, to be able to use positional sound the audio must have only one audio channel.

        Parameters:
        id - An unmapped ID.
        loc - A url pointing to a .wav file.
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException - If an error occurred loading sound.

      • loadMusic

        public static void loadMusic(java.lang.String id,
                             java.net.URL loc)
                      throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException

        Loads music from the URL and maps it to the specified ID.

        The supported types are:

        • .ogg
        • .wav
        • .aif
        • .aiff
        • .xm
        • .mod
        Parameters:
        id - An unmapped ID.
        loc - A URL pointing to music.
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException - If an error occurred loading the music.
